user_query: My family is planning a weekend getaway and we want to visit a brewery that offers a variety of beers for both adults and kids. Can you suggest a family-friendly brewery and provide the nutritional analysis for the food options they have? Additionally, we would like to try some unique cocktails during our visit.

TaskList.description: Find a family-friendly brewery that offers a variety of beers and has kid-friendly options.
Retrieve the menu and nutritional information for the food options available at the selected brewery.
Look up unique cocktail options available at the brewery.
